DOC.brief_summary: This trial explores the immunologic effects of vemurafenib (BRAF inhibitor) and cobimetinib (MEK inhibitor), administered alone and in combination, to patients with advanced BRAF V600E/K mutant melanoma.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Vemurafenib and Cobimetinib in Patients With Advanced BRAFV600 Mutant Melanoma
